sentence.Network_cn: 这样的租户是受到法律保护的。

sentence.Network_en: Broadcasting has had to be regulated statutorily.
sentence.Network_cn: 广播业已经必须进行法律监管了。

sentence.Network_en: For example, the statutorily mandated rulemaking process will take time.
sentence.Network_cn: 譬如, 制定法律条文需要时间.

PerfectNetExp.abs: delimit the structures and sizes statutorily ., 实现机构和编制的法定化.

list.abs: for example , the statutorily mandated rulemaking process will take time .譬如，制定法律条文需要时间。
delimit the structures and sizes statutorily ., 实现机构和编制的法定化.
other equity shall be transferred to the Investee Company by the statutorily prescribed method .其他股权依照法定方式转让给被投资公司。
placed statutorily under the council's supervision .依法置于委员会的监管之下。

entry.def: Statutory means relating to rules or laws which have been formally written down.

example.ex: We had a statutory duty to report to Parliament.
example.tran: 我们有向议会报告的法定义务。

auth_sentence.content: I think another look at the range of expertise that was required statutorily on the advisory council was overdue.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think another look at the range of expertise that was required statutorily on the advisory council was overdue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think another look at the range of expertise that was required statutorily on the advisory council was overdue.
